app.tagline: Modern automation • Web3 • n8n • Telegram • Turn‑key scripts

cards.title: Scripts & integrations
cards.desc: Data parsing, routine automation, API integrations. Fast and reliable.

cards.title: n8n automation
cards.desc: From idea to pipeline: processing, AI agents, Google Sheets/Drive, webhooks.

cards.title: Web / Telegram
cards.desc: Landing pages, widgets, bots. Thoughtful UX and payment/CRM integrations.

items.q: How do we start a project?
items.a: Short call/chat → brief → timing/cost estimate → development sprints → release.
MVP usually 3–10 days. Depends on integrations and logic volume.
Next.js/React, Tailwind, n8n, Telegram Bot API, Node.js, Postgres/MySQL, GSheets/Drive.
Fixed per sprint or hourly. Milestones and post‑payment after demos are possible.
